product_name: Roxy Syncro 5mm Round Toe Paddling Booties - Women's
long_description: The Roxy Synchro 5mm Round Toe paddling booties for women help keep your feet comfortable in cold water and offer plenty of grip for kayaking, canoeing and stand-up paddleboarding. 5mm neoprene fabric offers excellent insulation; glued and blind-stitched seams help eliminate chafing. Textured rubber soles enhance traction on a paddleboard, canoe or kayak. Rubber soles wrap around the uppers, adding protection to your heels, toes and the sides of your feet. Rip-and-stick arch strap creates a snug, comfortable fit. Reinforced stress points at ankles increase durability. To put on the The Roxy Synchro 5mm Round Toe paddling booties, roll down uppers, insert foot, roll up, and use loop at heel to properly seat foot.
short_description: The Roxy Synchro 5mm Round Toe paddling booties for women help keep your feet comfortable in cold water and offer plenty of grip for kayaking, canoeing and stand-up paddleboarding.
